Description: You materialize a set of large fangs that bite at a creature with psychic energy. Make a ranged attack, dealing psychic damage on a hit. On a hit, this move bypasses and ends Aurora veil, and is not affected by Light Screen and Reflect.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
